comments.author: joker_josue
comments.body: Well, if your idea is to promote tokens, and writing a request for help topic is not enough. I have serious doubts that it will be able to make a good promotion.Either way, to make this type of advertisement, you must do it here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=159.0

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: I don't know how to make an expression of how you just behaved OP, just to type ordinarily you can't, you're referring to the title that it explains all, fine and good, the community is also referring you to read about the forum and learn to post quality contents, read the posting etiquettes required from you, understand the forum's rules and regulations and learb to be specific in areas you will need other's attention to by asking but ensure its an aspect that has not been already discussed.

comments.author: Ryker1
comments.body: I believed you can post it here [ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=240.0 ].Read the pinned post in that section you will find out more answers. Or for more costly promotions than making an Announcement thread, you can promote it via bounty campaign promotion, just like a Social media campaign and signature campaign promotion which paid participants either your token or via dollar rate.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Quote from: jojoxoxo on March 21, 2023, 07:26:08 AMAs titleI understand that you're a new member but this isn't a polite way to express it as it really doesn't make any sense. I hope others don't follow suit in such way to announcing themselves cause it's quite primitive
